compatibility.notes: SUL-1.0 is a permissive license that allows for integration with other permissive licenses without imposing restrictions. However, care should be taken when combining with copyleft licenses.

key_requirements: Use or modify the software only for internal business purposes or non-commercial/personal use.
Distribute the software only free of charge for non-commercial purposes.
If you make a patent claim regarding the software, your patent license ends immediately.
license.name: SUL-1.0
obligations: You must provide a copy of the license terms to anyone you distribute the software to.
You must include a prominent notice stating modifications if you modify the software.
You may not alter, remove, or obscure any licensing, copyright, or other notices.
